hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select r.Id as Id, t.Id as tId, t.Name as tName, c.Id as cId, c.Name as cName, o.Id as oId, o.Name as oName, r.Rate as Rate from dbo.TariffRates r inner join dbo.Cards c on c.Id = r.CardId inner join dbo.Tariffs t on t.Id = r.TariffId inner join dbo.CardOperations o on o.Id = r.CardOperationId
